page.title: 03HANBURY VILLAGE FETE
page.content: The village fete is held every year in the month of June in the grounds of nearby{Hanbury Hall.} Many local groups run stalls such as fancy goods, plants, bottles, cakes, stationary etc. During the afternoon there are various entetainments provided by local organizations. These include a country dancing display by the children from the{village school,}a fancy dress competition, a display by the local ballet school and music by a youth band. Afternoon teas are served in the long gallery of the hall. It is a marvellous setting for a village occasion and the proceeds of the fete are divided between{Hanbury {Church}and{Hanbury Village Hall}and so benefit the whole community. The fete is opened by the Administrator of the Hall.
